attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop paying benefits to immigrants as soon as they arrive.

Insist on immigrants having enough funding to support themselves for 12 months after arrival in the UK.

Do not pay benefits for the first five years after arrival to the UK.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
